[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/node-core-library](./node-core-library.md) &gt; [MinimumHeap](./node-core-library.minimumheap.md) &gt; [poll](./node-core-library.minimumheap.poll.md)

## MinimumHeap.poll() method

Retrieves and removes the root item from the heap. The next smallest item will become the new root.

**Signature:**

```typescript
poll(): T | undefined;
```
**Returns:**

T \| undefined

the root item, or `undefined` if the heap is empty
